title:
K-beauty comes to Turkey as Korean cosmetics exports boom -
                        Nikkei Asia
text: Exclusive data shows online sales surge ISTANBUL/SEOUL -- After K-pop and K-drama, the latest Korean export surging in popularity in Turkey and the Middle East is K-beauty. According to data from Turkey's largest e-commerce company, Trendyol, shared exclusively with Nikkei Asia, sales of South Korean cosmetics on its platform have been running five times higher than a year ago. Discover the all new Nikkei Asia app Nikkei Asian Review, now known as Nikkei Asia, will be the voice of the Asian Century.
